channel.title: Better Aiming
channel.description:
One thing that's always bothered me about Half Life in general - as a FPS fan - is the fact that you can't aim down your sights. It's especially frustrating when the "SMG" in HL2 has a nice looking red dot sight just sitting there. :frowning:
Would that be possible to do in Source? Because if it is, putting that into Black Mesa Source would be absolutely amazing. :freeman:

because it’s fine when gordon holds his gun like rambo and does not use ironsights.

update:
Personally I think it’s very important for a FPS, that the viewmodel exactly points towarts the crosshair. I’ve seen many custom weapon models for HL which have high polycounts and a nice detailed texture, but suck in positioning/animations… so I hope BMS will have HL1 styled origins and positioning.
